https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z29F9sXxBbf1DAxx5Q6OwZk6fQU.jpg In modern day Iran, a female attorney fights for the custody of her seven year old diabetic son following a divorce from her husband. When the courts rule against her, she takes desperate actions that lead to tragic events. A Thousand Women Like Me
